title: PICSOU en action
desc: Analyse les cours de la bourse et propose des ordres d'achat et de vente de valeurs

ptf_percent.sql_color: case when ptf_percent > 0 then '#006600' else '#FF0000' end

ptf_gainj.sql_color: case when ptf_gainj = 0 then '#FFFFFF' when ptf_gainj > 0 then '#006600' else '#FF0000' end

ptf_rsi.sql_color: case when ptf_rsi > 67 then '#006600' when ptf_rsi < 37 then '#FF0000' else '#000000' end

ptf_q12.sql_color: case when ptf_q12 > 2 then '#006600' else '#FF0000' end

ptf_q26.sql_color: case when ptf_q26 > 2 then '#006600' else '#FF0000' end

ptf_q50.sql_color: case when ptf_q50 > 2 then '#006600' else '#FF0000' end

ptf_trend50.sql_color: case when ptf_trend50 > 0 then '#006600' else '#FF0000' end

ptf_volp.sql_color: case when ptf_volp > 80 then '#006600' when ptf_volp < 20 then '#FF0000' else '#000000' end

ptf_nbj.sql_color: case when ptf_nbj = 0 then '#FFFFFF' else '#303030' end

ptf_quantity.sql_color: case when ptf_quantity = 0 then '#FFFFFF' else '#303030' end

ptf_gain.sql_color: case when ptf_gain = 0 then '#FFFFFF' when ptf_gain > 0 then '#006600' else '#FF0000' end

ptf_gainp.sql_color: case when ptf_gainp = 0 then '#FFFFFF' when ptf_gainp > 0 then '#006600' else '#FF0000' end

vopen.title: Mes Titres
vopen.sql_where: ptf_account is not null and ptf_account <> ''
vopen.sql_footer: SELECT printf('PEA Gain du jour: %.2f € Cash: %.2f Gain: %.2f € Latent: %.2f € soit %.2f %', acc_gain_day, acc_money, acc_gain, acc_latent, acc_percent) AS sql_footer FROM ACCOUNT where acc_id = 'PEA'

vnote.title: Note
vnote.sql_where: (ptf_disabled is null or ptf_disabled <> '1') and (ptf_note <> '' or ptf_trade <> '')

vsimul.xx: Vue particulière lus par les plugins batch
vsimul.title: Simulateur

cours_percent.sql_color: case when cours_percent < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end

cours_rsi.sql_color: case when cours_rsi > 67 then '#006600' when cours_rsi < 37 then '#FF0000' else '#000000' end

cours_q12.sql_color: case when cours_q12 < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end

cours_q26.sql_color: case when cours_q26 < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end

cours_q50.sql_color: case when cours_q50 < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end

cours_volp.sql_color: case when cours_volp < 20 then '#FF0000' when cours_volp > 60 then '#006600' else '#000000' end

cours_trend12.sql_color: case when cours_trend12 < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end

cours_trend26.sql_color: case when cours_trend26 < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end

cours_trend50.sql_color: case when cours_trend50 < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end

cours_gainj.sql_color: case when cours_gainj < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end

cours_gain.sql_color: case when cours_gain < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end

cours_gainp.sql_color: case when cours_gainp < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end

mvt_ptf_id.sql_items: select ptf_id, ptf_name from ptf order by ptf_id

ptf_name.sql_items: select ptf_id, ptf_name from ptf order by ptf_id

jointure.join: LEFT OUTER JOIN ptf ON ptf.ptf_id = mvt.mvt_ptf_id

mvt_trade.sql_color: case when mvt_trade = 'Achat' then '#0000FF' else '#000000' end

mvt_quantity.sql_default: select ptf_quantity from ptf where ptf_id = '{mvt_ptf_id}'

mvt_gain_day.sql_color: case when mvt_gain_day < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end

mvt_gain.sql_color: case when mvt_gain < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end

mvt_gain_percent.sql_color: case when mvt_gain_percent < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end

col_sql_updateX: UPDATE mvt set mvt_select = case when mvt_select = '1' then '' else '1' end where mvt_id = '{mvt_id}'

ptf_q12.sql_color: case when ptf.ptf_q12 < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end

ptf_q26.sql_color: case when ptf.ptf_q26 < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end

ptf_q50.sql_color: case when ptf.ptf_q50 < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end

ptf_rsi.sql_color: case when ptf.ptf_rsi > 67 then '#006600' when ptf.ptf_rsi < 37 then '#FF0000' else '#000000' end

vall.title: Historique
vall.order_by: mvt_account, mvt_date desc, mvt_ptf_id, mvt_trade asc

vsuivi.title: PEE PEA
vsuivi.sql_footer: SELECT printf('PEA Gain du jour: %.2f € Espèce: %.2f Gain: %.2f € Latent: %.2f € soit %.2f %', acc_gain_day, acc_money, acc_gain, acc_latent, acc_percent) AS sql_footer FROM ACCOUNT where acc_id = 'PEA'

vsimul.title: Simul
vsimul.sql_footer: SELECT printf('SIMUL Gain du jour: %.2f € Espèce: %.2f Gain: %.2f € Latent: %.2f € soit %.2f %', acc_gain_day, acc_money, acc_gain, acc_latent, acc_percent) AS sql_footer FROM ACCOUNT where acc_id = 'SIMUL'

vfictif.title: Fictif
vfictif.sql_footer: SELECT printf('FICTIF Gain du jour: %.2f € Espèce: %.2f Gain: %.2f € Latent: %.2f € soit %.2f %', acc_gain_day, acc_money, acc_gain, acc_latent, acc_percent) AS sql_footer FROM ACCOUNT where acc_id = 'FICTIF'

acc_money.sql_color: case when acc_money < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end

acc_gain_day.sql_color: case when acc_gain_day < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end

acc_gain.sql_color: case when acc_gain < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end

acc_percent.sql_color: case when acc_percent < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end

cdays_percent.sql_color: case when cdays_percent < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end

cdays_gain.sql_color: case when cdays_gain < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end

cdays_gainp.sql_color: case when cdays_gainp < 0 then '#FF0000' else '#006600' end
